Class IssueThreadSpawner<ISSUE,COMMENT>

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      creates a thread spawner that can be used to start threads for processing issues and commits

    • Constructor Detail

      • IssueThreadSpawner

        public IssueThreadSpawner(IssueConverter<ISSUE> issueConverter,
                          CommentRetriever<COMMENT,ISSUE> commentRetriever,
                          CommentConverter<COMMENT,ISSUE> commentConverter,
                          DBSettings dbSettings,
                          String project,
                          int threadPoolSize,
                          boolean doImport)
        creates a thread spawner that can be used to start threads for processing issues and commits
        Parameters:
        issueConverter - a converter for issues
        commentRetriever - a utility that can be used to receive the comments for issues
        commentConverter - a converter for comments
        dbSettings - database settings
        project - the project of which data is processed
        threadPoolSize - the number of worker threads that shall be created
        doImport - if true the issues will be imported, if false they will stored and can be accessed by getResults()

      • IssueThreadSpawner

        public IssueThreadSpawner(IssueConverter<ISSUE> issueConverter,
                          IssueFilter<ISSUE> issueFilter,
                          CommentRetriever<COMMENT,ISSUE> commentRetriever,
                          CommentConverter<COMMENT,ISSUE> commentConverter,
                          DBSettings dbSettings,
                          String project,
                          int threadPoolSize,
                          boolean doImport)
        creates a thread spawner that can be used to start threads for processing issues and commits
        Parameters:
        issueConverter - a converter for issues
        issueFilter - a filter that can be used to filter issues locally; can be null if they shall not be filtered
        commentRetriever - a utility that can be used to receive the comments for issues
        commentConverter - a converter for comments
        dbSettings - database settings
        project - the project of which data is processed
        threadPoolSize - the number of worker threads that shall be created
        doImport - if true the issues will be imported, if false they will stored and can be accessed by getResults()

    • Method Detail

      • finish

        public void finish()
            throws InterruptedException
        adds elements to the work queue to signal the worker thread that no more batches will be added and waits for them to stop
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - occurs if the thread is interrupted while stopping the other threads

      • isShutdown

        public boolean isShutdown()
        tests if the executor is shutdown or shall be shutdown as soon as possible
        Returns:
        true if it is shutdown or is going to shutdown as soon as possible; else false

      • put

        public void put(List<ISSUE> issues,
                int index)
         throws InterruptedException
        adds an batch of issues to the working queue
        Parameters:
        issues - list of issues that will be executed as a batch
        index - the index of this batch block
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - occurs if the thread is interrupted while waiting for adding it to the queue

      • stopNow

        public void stopNow()
             throws InterruptedException
        all worker threads will finish their current batch and then will stop. this method will block till all threads are stopped
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - occurs if the thread is interrupted while stopping the other threads

      • getResults

        public List<Issue> getResults(int elemSize)
        this will return all elements that were processed from the worker threads in their correct order
        Parameters:
        elemSize - number of expected elements in each value of the results HashMap, if unknown set it to <=0
        Returns:
        the retrieved elements in correct order

      • getErrors

        public String getErrors()
        Returns:
        errors that occured while executing the workers
